title: Factorial Calculator
statement:
# Factorial Calculator

Write a program to compute the factorial of a number.

## Problem Description

The factorial of N (written N!) is the product of all positive integers from 1 to N.
- 0! = 1
- 5! = 5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1 = 120

## Input Format

A single non-negative integer N.

## Output Format

The factorial of N.

## Constraints

- 0 ≤ N ≤ 20
